BIRDBOT / PAPERTRON





Papertron: HEH! HEH!



Birdbot: I've took a guys =
head off before. He wouldn't share so I killed him. I only wanted all 10 bo=
xes of pizza but he only gave me 9 boxes and a half of another one! He had =
the nerve to keep one piece for himself!!!! So I ripped his head off and at=
e all 10 boxes. And then I woke up all of the neighbors by screaming and si=
nging Barry Manolow.



Papertron: ERF FER FER FER!!! I have 4 identities. =
Don't tell anyone. But right now I'm Papertron. But sometimes I'm Apple Fur=
ry Murry, The Smelly Guy and The Silly Goon. ERF FER FER FER!!....
  ----- =

om

ge starts laughing.

tyles. So, are you any good at fighting?...

=





    Papertron: Well, I'm a stinky chameleon. Erf fer fer fer! Trespass=
ing? I don't know what that is but I've been trying to get those peoples at=
tention. I want to live there.



    (Birdbot looks at Sarge and stands up=
 straight.)



    Birdbot: RY! All I want is what everyone else is eating!=
 RY! Nothing is wrong with me accept I hate people when they don't leave me=
 alone! And I hate whiney crying people and laughing people. I want to join=
 this guys too but they keep ignoring us. Do you know one of their names so=
 I can call them out here?....
